tag_list: interactive, digital, advertising, marketing, multimedia, seo, you-make-the-website
overview:
Dean Wormald is an ex-Interactive Producer now working on a few small startup ideas to help people make websites themselves.

After graduating from University with a Bachelor in Multimedia and Marketing, Dean started working on xbox.com.au, with Xbox Australia’s digital interactive advertising agency - amnesia (now amnesia razorfish).

After spending 5 years in the industry, working for ninemsn, Microsoft and Clemenger, Dean left the Monday-to-Friday job and started his own thing.

That own thing is You Make The Website, which is an eGuide made for all skills levels, to help them succeed in making professional and industry standard quality business and personal websites.
